props.name: text
props.description: Text for the option item. If content is provided in the default slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: value
props.description: The value of this option. The parent `GvSelect`'s `v-model` will be set to this value if the option is selected.

slots.name: default
slots.description: The content of the option. If content is provided in this slot, the `text` prop will be ignored.
